code: import React from"react";import ChatBox from"../chat-box";import"./style.css";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";var ChatPanel=function ChatPanel(){var contacts=useSelector(function(state){return state.contacts;});var selectedContact=useSelector(function(state){return state.selectedContact;});return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,contacts.map(function(item,i){return item.jid===selectedContact?React.createElement("div",{key:i,className:"col-sm-8 chat-panel",id:item.jid},React.createElement(ChatBox,null)):null;}));};export default ChatPanel;
